website_summaries.verdict: Covers the essential exam topics and materials in an easy-to-understand format. Kindle and paperback 3rd edition versions are available, but the hardcover is the updated 4th edition.
pros: Straightforward, easy-to-read text with a tone that's more lighthearted than other books in its class
Includes a CD and numerous sample questions
Also useful as a reference guide for CAPM professionals
Author has more than 12 years experience in the field
Fourth edition that was updated in 2018 is available in hardcover
cons: Many of the practice questions don't seem very challenging, and some explanations can be very basic
Paperback and Kindle versions are 3rd edition

customer_reviews.title: I passed!
customer_reviews.text: Look, I'm you average Joe trying to make something out of myself in the Project management world. This book helped a ton in studying for the CAPM. It comes with software that simulates the actual test, that is crazy helpful. The book is much less dry than the PMBOK as well. There is some personality in it! I highly recommend this book for studying for the CAPM. I passed the exam!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Broomhead

customer_reviews.title: Best book out there to pass PMP.
customer_reviews.text: If you want to pass the PMP exam buy this book. Do not buy this if you want to learn in depth about Project Management. For that you got PMBOK guide from PMI. In the past I bought the book by Rita Mulcahy and it is the most complicated one out there. As a matter of fact after reading that book, I gave up the idea to write PMP exam, as it was giving me a headache! Now I am all set, Joseph Phillips is awesome and the DVD that comes with it really helps one in preparing for the exam.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't help with the exam
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, this book is good to read, but does NOT help you pass the exam. The tests in each chapter is pretty easy and some of the answers are in the question itself. Unfortunately, this has nothing to do with the real exam. At least the one I took. Too much concept you need to memorize, the input/output probably took 70% of the total questions.
customer_reviews.author: hua

customer_reviews.title: I passed the CAPM exam on the first try!
customer_reviews.text: This book helped me pass the exam! It helped me understand the concepts and process groups of the PMBOK guide. The only negative I can say is the CAPM mock exam included was not heavy on the process groups. However, I repeatedly took the CAPM mock exam AND the Process Flow group mock exam included and that was a huge help in passing the exam on the first try. I would highly recommend buying this book is you're considering taking either the CAPM or PMP exam.
customer_reviews.author: ThePenguin

customer_reviews.title: Recommend but...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this book in preparation for the CAPM. I read the book twice, made flash cards for every definition and took the end-of-chapter exams multiple times. I would definitely recommend purchasing this book if you’re preparing for PMP or CAPM but two words of caution are: the book does not emphasize the importance of understanding ITTOs. ITTOs were mentioned throughout, but not to the extent I felt they should have been. Also, the Total Tester practice exam content isn’t available on Macs, so I had to pay for a separate program (Pocket Prep, would recommend) in order to take full practice tests. Also, I emailed the support email address once, but never heard back.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry C.

customer_reviews.title: Helped me to pass
customer_reviews.text: Great book to understand the CAPM exam. The practice tests on the enclosed CD are good for an overview (the real test is a bit different). But, I was able to pass the CAPM on the first try! I basically used the PDF so that I could read the book on a mobile device instead of carrying the book all over the place. The chapter tests are pretty thorough.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey J

customer_reviews.title: This is a great book! Disregard bad reviews!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about purchasing this book due to some giving it bad reviews such as don't use this as your only study guide or it didn't assist in helping pass the test. The author clearly states throughout the book to use the PMBOK guide in conjunction with this book. So I'm wondering for those who didn't pass did you really read the book. I used both and had no trouble. This book made me reading the PMBOK easier to understand. The book is worth the money and the CD that comes along with it. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great Book!
customer_reviews.text: I recently used this book to pass my CAPM exam. It was the only book/tool I used. The book comes with a CD which includes great resources. I wish I would have explored the disk earlier in my studying. As a side note, I wish I would have studied the processes and their inputs and outputs more. Even though I passed, I would have felt more comfortable during my exam.
customer_reviews.author: Bri G

customer_reviews.title: The writing style is easy going however much truth in this topic that it ...
customer_reviews.text: The writing style is easy going however much truth in this topic that it is like watching paint dry...... Frankly am having great difficulty getting engaged and this book is much easier to read then the PMBOK. I rated it 4 stars due to the well thought out subject matter flow and its stated goal of passing the test. The failure of following through is of my own doing.....However I would recommend the book others, the light hearted writing style is not as dry as the PMBOK...
customer_reviews.author: Chinookman

customer_reviews.title: Rita’s is better
customer_reviews.text: Started out using this book but switched to Rita’s half way through. Rita’s was much more thorough and complete.
customer_reviews.author: Papa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Resource for CAPM - Passed on First Go!
customer_reviews.text: Mr. Phillips, I would like to thank you for the instruction provided in the CAPM/PMP All-in-One Exam Guide. I like your writing style and the read was very enjoyable considering I read the PMBOK first. The book is a great supplement to the PMBOK, and some practice tests that I purchased from PMStudy.com. I passed the exam yesterday. I was a little anxious to take it, I was not nervous about the exam itself and felt very prepared. Thanks Again,
customer_reviews.author: Steven Durst

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: A good book, but not by any means perfect. I suggest picking up the PMBOK along with this. This book will help build a base understanding of Project Management principles and theories and the PMBOK is great for reviewing processes and ITTOs. Using a combination of these I was able to pass the CAPM.
customer_reviews.author: MLavore

customer_reviews.title: The book is an awesome preparation tool for taking the PM exam
customer_reviews.text: The book is an awesome preparation tool for taking the PM exam. All examples and test leads to a successful outcome. In conjunction with other study material being used, I strongly feel that I will have no problem passing the exam on the first attempt.
customer_reviews.author: valkeith

customer_reviews.title: Understandable and Didactical
customer_reviews.text: What I like the most of this book is that it explains in a very simple way the theory of PM. This book is really didácticas. It makes you understand in simple terms, phrases and examples what looks hard to understand from the PMBOK. I haven't taken the exam yet, but I hope this book will help me achieve this goal.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: Need to access CD content
customer_reviews.text: I bought the kindle version and I want to also download the CD contents that comes with the physical book. But the website link mentioned is not loading/working. Anyone else has similar problems and have solved it?
customer_reviews.author: S.M

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: Was able to use this book to self teach and pass my exam!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very usefull
customer_reviews.text: This book did very little. I had to purchase a prep-cast and it has much better explanations. the test questions not so good either. I would not recommend the book.
customer_reviews.author: El BeBo

customer_reviews.title: First choice
customer_reviews.text: Best book I reviewed - and I reviewed at least fifteen. I use it for my students in a PM class. It's clear, easy to read, and makes it easy to understand how to study for the CAPM or PMP test.
customer_reviews.author: GF in IL

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product the week before my CAPM, and took the tests in the CD to prepare. I passed with flying colors, but definitely would've loved to spend more time studying this book.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great Study Materials
customer_reviews.text: While I've been involved in the project management discipline for ~4 years now, it has been as a member of a PMO and PPMO, not as an actual Project Manager / Practitioner. My new job description required me to take and pass the CAPM exam. After putting in a few weeks of preparation and studying The CAPM/PMP All-in-One Book, I just passed my CAPM exam today, and felt very prepared. I didn't have to look at the PMBOK once. I felt so prepared for the CAPM that I feel I should've taken the PMP... So thank you for helping me pass this exam!
customer_reviews.author: Max Rustad

customer_reviews.title: Buy this guide!
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this study guide to anyone serious about passing their PMP examination. The guide was a great resource for learning the massive amount of material covered by the PMBOK. The information is presented in a way that is very easy to absorb. The database of exam questions, chapter tests and the authors tips for preparing for and taking the exam were invaluable. Thanks to this study guide I passed my exam the first time and it was the only resource I used to prepare.
customer_reviews.author: Traci S

customer_reviews.title: The BEST prep resource! A must have before the exam.
customer_reviews.text: This book is the BEST resource to prepare for CAPM. I took the exam today and passed from the first attempt. I was able to complete all the 150 questions within 1hr and 15 minutes. The book comes with a CD and it has 320 questions , I highly recommend that you take the simulation exam.Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Hayder

customer_reviews.title: Get in the know to pass the exam the first time.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent study guide, easy to read, made passing the test a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Friedlander

customer_reviews.title: Excellent book
customer_reviews.text: I passed the exam using this book. Unlike most theoretical books, this book is written in a language easy to comprehend and follow.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent PMP study aid.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent addition to the PMBOK with many examples and a very engaging writing manner, it made understanding many of the complex PMP processes much easier than the stale PMBOK text. I would recommend this book to anyone studying for their PMP qualification or looking to refresh their memory as to the PMI's recommended processes.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Matt

customer_reviews.title: Passed exam on the first try!
customer_reviews.text: Great tool to study for your CAPM. I recently passed the exam on my first try and this was the only resource I used. Read the entire book, write a few notes on stuff you do not understand, take the chapter practice questions multiple times, and use the CD that is provided to take simulated exams. This is exactly what I did to pass the exam. You do not need to read the PMBOK; this book does a great job of breaking down what you need to know in an easy read fashion so that you can pass the exam on the first try.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Holmes

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Used solely this book to study for the CAPM and I failed.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Six years ago, I tried twice to pass my ...
customer_reviews.text: Six years ago, I tried twice to pass my CAPM exam, after attending two professional prep seminars. I only had one shot left, and then someone told me about this book. Six years ago I bought the second edition and after 12 weeks of studying, I passed with flying colors. So now it's time for me to take the PMP exam. So I bought the third edition and just started my studying. Wish me luck!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me.
customer_reviews.text: Took a project management class this semester. I Thought I could pass the CAPM with that alone but bought the book just in case. I would not recommend taking a CAPM or PMP without going through this cover to cover. Passed on my first try but probably would not have without this book.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ranshaw

customer_reviews.title: good explanations. The questions are sometimes a bit off
customer_reviews.text: The chapter information is OK, good explanations. The questions are sometimes a bit off, and the explanations are VERY basic--as in: (A) is the correct answer because ... . (B),(C), and (D) are incorrect. Very rarely does the author actually explain why the incorrect answers are NOT right. I have found in studying other books for other certifications that that sort of explanation is almost MORE helpful than the explanation for why the right answer is correct. Additionally, the included electronic content is an .exe file and therefore does not work unless you have a windows OS.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Cavazos

customer_reviews.title: The only book you will need
customer_reviews.text: This book and associated study materials were exactly what was needed to pass the PMP exam. I bought several books and study aids, but this was the only one I used. Easy to read, practice tests and complimentary videos. This book saved me thousands in boot camp and retest fees.
customer_reviews.author: STEPHEN KAGEY

customer_reviews.title: Great Book
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this book for a project management class I had to take. This book explains everything great and really helped me understand that material and it has great prep material for the CAPM.PAP exams.
customer_reviews.author: jhensley

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: The sample that software it comes with is bbn super handy
customer_reviews.author: Jack Michael McDaniels

customer_reviews.title: Good study guide. Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great resource for studying. Very approachable and well layed out.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Binder

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: The PMBOK is not a fun read and this book makes digesting the material bearable.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good investment...
customer_reviews.text: Could have passed without it, but it did help. Good investment in my professional development.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Helped me pass my CAPM on the first attempt
customer_reviews.text: I found this book to be a great help with my CAPM exam, and I have passed my exam on the first attempt. I found the reading materials that came with my CAPM course tough to follow in many places, and this book does a great job of simplifying the processes and making them easier to understand in a practical PM environment. The practise exams at the end of each chapter, and tips for passing the exam were very helpful too. There are a few pieces of information early in the book which don't seem to have been updated after the implementation of the PMBOK 5th edition however, but overall still a very helpful resource for passing the CAPM exam.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Green

customer_reviews.title: Great Prep Guide
customer_reviews.text: This prep guide exactly parallels the PMBOK guide section by section. No jumping around the "knowledge" areas. It's even "readable".
customer_reviews.author: stlrich

customer_reviews.title: It's Ok
customer_reviews.text: Nof sure if it was more the subject or the way it was presented, but this was OK. Nothing to write home about.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Nani

customer_reviews.title: PMBOK - The Enjoyable Guide to...
customer_reviews.text: A great book which breaks down the PMBOK into a readable format without the brain fade. It is still a subject with a lot of information and structured reading but Joseph puts it in a light that makes going back to read the PMBOK a lot more digestible. I could have survived with reading the PMBOK alone but Joseph gives a clarity and ease of wording that makes it enjoyable to read.
customer_reviews.author: David Gould

customer_reviews.title: Only bought this one and passed CAPM
customer_reviews.text: A very interesting and helpful book, I bought this one and passed my CAPM in April 2016. For CAPM exam, the practice exam questions and chapter review questions are not exactly the same as the ones in the real exam. Questions in the book are more like scenario-based and a little bit tricky, which is I like, but exam questions are just straightforward. I didn't buy PMBOK , I know I should (if you are a PMI member, you can have PMBOK ebook downloaded online), even the author suggests to buy PMBOK as a reference, but only have this one is good to go. Doing the practice exam questions over and over again, as the author suggested repetition is crucial.
customer_reviews.author: BiubiuLee

customer_reviews.title: Fun Read
customer_reviews.text: Hands down way easier read that PMBOK Guide but with all the same info you’ll need to actually understand the PMBOK Guide.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: OK for training but there is to be a newer version
customer_reviews.author: Terri L Leedy

customer_reviews.title: Funny, simple, helpful
customer_reviews.text: This book is great! The author is funny, and lays everything out simply. I particularly appreciated the definitions in the back of each chapter (helped with flashcards), and the tests on the CD.
customer_reviews.author: Loki

customer_reviews.title: A helpful guide to passing PMP
customer_reviews.text: I found this book very helpful in studying for and passing my PMP. The additional material included like the study schedule, and especially the exam prep cheatsheets were great. There may be a lot more expensive books out there and even those boot camps for major $$$. But, if you read this book and do the practice exams according to the simple study program shown in the book, I believe you should pass the PMP just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Marxus_NY

customer_reviews.title: I passed my test with using this book alone. ...
customer_reviews.text: I passed my test with using this book alone. However, I can't stress enough how important it is to know all the processes, inputs, tools and techniques, and out puts. This book will definitely help if you take the time to follow all the author's instructions on utilization. I suggest using the study map he has at the beginning of the book!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Layman

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for all potential CAPM/PMP certification achievers...
customer_reviews.text: I love that this book uses language I can understand. Reading the PMBOK can be tedious and I feel like this book easily and effectively translates it into a language that everyday users can reference. It also provides tips on how to study, logic behind the questions, and other references to ensure that you understand what you are learning. I constantly use it as a reference. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: lennie

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend it. I now have my CAPM certification
customer_reviews.text: The complementary material is really helpful. I highly recommend it. I now have my CAPM certification! :)
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Great reference
customer_reviews.text: Deep dive, but a little wordy. Great as a CISSP reference book on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: deborah baker

customer_reviews.title: great book for the PMP/CAPM
customer_reviews.text: my wife passed! and got the job she desired! this is a good course for manager types.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis C. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: It has been fantastic, I love it easy to read every day ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a CAPM instructor and bought this book to supplement my library. It has been fantastic, I love it easy to read every day language while at the same time its attention to the core principles. I would recommend this book as a must have in your CAPM certification preparation arsenal. Lorraine Lord, MBA, PMP.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a good reference when studying for your CAPM or PMP certifications.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent book and easy to read and understand!
customer_reviews.text: I'm reading it along with the PMBOK and it gives a clearer understanding and emphasizes the important items to pass the test.
customer_reviews.author: EA Biggers

customer_reviews.title: A very good book that helped me pass the CAPM Exam
customer_reviews.text: A very good book that helped me pass the CAPM Exam. Totally worth it! The exam simulator is awesome and very similar to the real exam!
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalo

customer_reviews.title: While the content is great, The questions helped me to understand the concept ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought the book for CAPM exam. While the content is great, The questions helped me to understand the concept better. I passed CAPM with flying marks and will be taking PMP sometime next year
customer_reviews.author: Filbert

customer_reviews.title: the all in one capm/pmp is by far the best comprehensive and up to date source of materials that ...
customer_reviews.text: From the books that I studied during my time learning project management, the all in one capm/pmp is by far the best comprehensive and up to date source of materials that I was given to dissect. It is a must read for all those who want to pass their capm or pmp certification with flying colors.
customer_reviews.author: clifford bordes

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected, price was below half of other sites.
customer_reviews.author: SimonPM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great resource! The book is very helpful in preparation for the test.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I seem to be in the minority. However I honestly just don't care for the writing style. The author love his words and topics could be described in a more to the point style rather than trying to inject corny humor and over the top business examples into every topic. What's the point in trying to dumb down concepts if you are going to use more words than the book your are trying to paraphrase. Personally I have preferred just reading the PMBOK.
customer_reviews.author: Prime_Addict77

customer_reviews.title: Access to videos
customer_reviews.text: How can I watch the videos. Where to find these. I bought the kindle version but don't see any information about the videos.
customer_reviews.author: Manisha Mohan

customer_reviews.title: Good book, haven't taken the test yet
customer_reviews.text: Good book, haven't taken the test yet. What is very vexing is the test questions don't run on a mac. You need windows to make the test questions work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good book to pass your PMP/CAPM exam. Although I would have liked that the author concentrated a little more in the Cost Management process, since it gets a little confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Read
customer_reviews.text: I passed the CAPM which was my goal. However, there were many questions on the practice tests that had the incorrect answers which was frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Resende

customer_reviews.title: Excrllent, Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent book! I would recommend it to anyone studying for their PMP certification.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: A very good book. Easy to read
customer_reviews.text: A very good book. Easy to read. The cheat sheet and the ITTO tables are helpful. I have passed the CAPM exam on the first attempt.
customer_reviews.author: QW

customer_reviews.title: Great book to assist with preparation for the exam
customer_reviews.text: i recommend this book as great exam prep material. I passed my CAPM exam after studying with this book and notes.
customer_reviews.author: CDR

customer_reviews.title: Love it really
customer_reviews.text: Very useful book and great information to learn from. I would really recommend this book for all CAPM/PMP exam students
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this book to anyone looking to pass the PMP/CAPM
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this book to anyone looking to pass the PMP/CAPM. I didn't even have to open the PMBOK thanks to this book.
customer_reviews.author: sad_panda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This book is perfect. I studied this for my PMP exam and passed in first time.
customer_reviews.author: Pouya Gh. Tajbakhsh

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This book is a must have for anyone preparing for the PMP Exams
customer_reviews.author: kingsley atsetinku

customer_reviews.title: Good book, bad software
customer_reviews.text: The book is good - makes the PMBOK easier to understand and provides glossary of terms to make flashcards from. The testing software included in the package needs an overhaul - the questions weren't difficult enough to drill for complete understanding of the material, and there were also a fair number of glitches (such as multiple choice questions with duplicate answers, or diagram-based questions missing the diagrams).
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B

customer_reviews.title: NOT a book for the visually-impaired or auditory learners.
customer_reviews.text: After testing to be sure I could listen to the Kindle ebook SAMPLE using Siri on my iPad, I purchased the Kindle Edition of the book. However, the purchased ebook can't be read by Siri. Now I'm stuck with an ebook I didn't need since I already own the printed version. It is really a shame that publishers are not supporting people who are visually-impaired or are auditory learners. I guess it is still widely acceptable to discriminate against the visually-impaired and auditory learner markets.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Barraco

customer_reviews.title: Great Study Tool
customer_reviews.text: This book is an awesome study tool to prepare for the CAPM.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernGirl212

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Incorrect Information
customer_reviews.text: Horrible book. Do not order this. Lots of incorrect information. Much better books out there (like Andy Crowe’s book).
customer_reviews.author: mmsva

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Now I have to use the thing to get that PMP done.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Young

customer_reviews.title: Where are the videos that were promised??
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about the purchase of this book. I downloaded the book through my kindle app on my iPad and I am not able to see the videos included in the book. I find this very disappointing. Does anyone have a suggestion on how I can see the videos. Please help.
customer_reviews.author: laptm

customer_reviews.title: Requires owning Windows OS
customer_reviews.text: Sure, a great book BUT beware MAC users - the CD-ROM and it's Practice Tests application is ONLY built for Windows machines. No warning to the customer, no mention of it anywhere until you buy the book and read the fine print in the book appendix. And there is no Mac version available. Major FAIL on McGraw-Hill - and Amazon's listing should point this out. Ridiculous. Renders a major asset of this book unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Israel

customer_reviews.title: Choose a better option.
customer_reviews.text: This was honestly one of the worst study-companions I've ever used. It is structured in a ridiculously confusing manner, and its almost as if the author doesn't understand the material himself. This book is not easy to follow, does not reflect the actual nature of the CAPM test, and is just flat out unhelpful. Use a different book.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I passed CAPM test on the first try!
customer_reviews.text: I passed on the first attempt, but the test had more process flow questions than this book acknowledged.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Oracle

product_meta.title: CAPM/PMP Project Management Certification All-In-One Exam Guide, Fourth Edition

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
